content: parnell uses two shades of berroco ultra alpaca light to create an oversized breton-inspired pullover the stripes are worked in the body and sleeves but the shoulders are worked in a solid color for a chic look shown in size 40 **finished measurements** bust 37 40 43 45 48 51 54 57 length 19½ 20 20½ 20½ 21 21 21½ 21½ back note the back of this garment is 2 longer than the front this garment was designed with approximately 3 5 of ease please take this into consideration when selecting your size **yarn** berroco ultra alpaca light 50 grs 6 6 7 7 7 8 9 10 hanks #42188 lunar mix mc and 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 3 hanks #4289 charcoal mix cc **needles and notions** straight needles size 5 3 75 mm *or size to obtain gauge* 24 circular needle size 3 3 25 mm 2 st markers 1 st holder **gauge** 23 sts and 32 row = 4 in st st on larger needles *to save time take time to check gauge*
